title: Art + Language: Word Banking II
copy: Word banks are a great tool for helping you improve your vocabulary, spelling, and creative writing skills. This activity uses works of art to help you generate your own word bank.   Are your students doing this activity at school or at home? If you need help selecting artworks, below is a list of recommended keywords to search. You can use these as a starting part or select your own from the museum’s website. Landscape Abstract Families   Grade Level: 5-8 Illinois Common Core State Standards for ELA: W1, W3, W4
